text: Timothy Peter Johnson (December 28, 1946 - October 8, 2024) was an American lawyer and politician. He was a United States Senator from South Dakota from 1997 to 2015. He was a member of the Democratic Party. He was the United States Representative for from 1987 to 1997. Johnson chose not to run for reelection in 2014. Johnson died on October 8, 2024 under hospice care in Sioux Falls, South Dakota from problems caused by a stroke at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2024 deaths Category:United States senators from South Dakota Category:United States representatives from South Dakota Category:Lawyers from South Dakota Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Deaths from stroke
title: Tim Johnson
